comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when exporting attached report design to a library file.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached design file.
2. Right click on file name and export it to a library file "library1.rptlibrary".
3. Click on "OK". NullpointerException is thrown out.

org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: Caused by java.lang.NullPointerException

The ElementFactory is enhanced, an extension element can be created using 
the generic newElement(String,String) factory method. 

Fixed
